page.title: 10Tourists in Greenwich
page.content: Tourists begin coming to Greenwich at Easter.In the beginning of the year it is mostly French tourists that come to Greenwich then English and after that a mixture.Round the Cutty Sark and in the v park are usually the most crowded places between eleven o,clock in the morning and four in the afternoon. There are thousands of tourists in Greenwich and around two o,clock it is very hard even to walk on the pavement.The tourists that come to Greenwich bring a lot of money.Most of them stay only for the day.Often prices in the shop are higher then they might usually be.The tourists come from place like France U.S.A.,Japan and Canada.Bu even though the tourists bring lots of money in summer the shops donÂ£t completely depend on them.
